Package farmSim

Class GuiGameEnviroment

java.lang.Object
farmSim.GuiGameEnviroment
public class GuiGameEnviroment
extends java.lang.Object
Logic handler for GUI Farming Simulator application.
Version:
10/05/2020
Author:
James Harris, Manjeet Panwar

  • Constructor Details

    • GuiGameEnviroment

      public GuiGameEnviroment()

  • Method Details

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState​(GameState gameState)
      Sets the current gameState to the one passed in.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the gameState use

    • checkCanGoNextDay

      public boolean checkCanGoNextDay()
      Returns true if current day is less than maximum number of days, else returns false.
      Returns:
      If game should continue, boolean

    • processEndOfDay

      public void processEndOfDay()
      Processes all end of day happenings. Gives player money based on animals Changes animals health and happiness based on multipliers Grows crops by daily growth rate Sets actions remaining to farmers daily actions

    • checkLegalName

      public boolean checkLegalName​(java.lang.String name)
      Checks is a given name is legal by matching it against a regular expression. Legal name must only contain alphabet characters and be between 3 and 15 characters inclusive.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to check
      Returns:
      True if name valid. False otherwise.

    • checkLegalNumberOfDays

      public boolean checkLegalNumberOfDays​(java.lang.String numOfDays)
      Checks if a given number of days is legal. Legal if an integer between 5 and 10 inclusive
      Parameters:
      numOfDays - the number of days to check
      Returns:
      true if legal, false otherwise

    • getItemList

      public java.lang.String getItemList()
      Returns a list of items owned by player.
      Returns:
      List of items owned by player

    • getCropsList

      public java.lang.String getCropsList()
      Returns a list of crops owned by player as string.
      Returns:
      List of crops owned by player

    • getAnimalsList

      public java.lang.String getAnimalsList()
      Returns a list of animals owned by player as string.
      Returns:
      List of crops owned by player

    • purchaseAnimal

      public void purchaseAnimal​(java.lang.String animalType, int cost)
      Purchase an animal by deducting cost from farm, Then adding animal to farm based on type. This method does not check whether purchasing an animal is legal
      Parameters:
      animalType - the type of animal to purchase
      cost - the cost of the animal to purchase

    • purchaseCrop

      public void purchaseCrop​(java.lang.String cropType, int cost)
      Purchase a crop by deducting cost from farm, Then adding crop to farm based on type. This method does not check whether purchasing a crop is legal
      Parameters:
      cropType - the type of crop to purchase
      cost - the cost of the crop to purchase

    • purchaseItem

      public void purchaseItem​(java.lang.String itemType, int cost)
      Purchase a item by deducting cost from farm, Then adding item to farm based on type. This method does not check whether purchasing a item is legal
      Parameters:
      itemType - the type of item to purchase
      cost - the cost of the item to purchase

    • checkAfforadable

      public boolean checkAfforadable​(int price)
      Checks if user can afford price of purchase.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to be check
      Returns:
      True if user has money at-least equal to price, else false.

    • checkSpaceForAnimals

      public boolean checkSpaceForAnimals()
      Checks if farm has space for new animal.
      Returns:
      true if space for new animal, false otherwise

    • checkSpaceForCrops

      public boolean checkSpaceForCrops()
      Checks if farm has space for new crops.
      Returns:
      true if space for new crops, false otherwise

    • checkUserHasItems

      public boolean checkUserHasItems​(java.lang.String[] itemTypes)
      Checks if the user owns items of given types by calling getUseableItemsOfType with itemTypes and checking size of result.
      Parameters:
      itemTypes - the types of items to check for
      Returns:
      True if user owns items of types, false otherwise

    • checkUserHasAnimals

      public boolean checkUserHasAnimals()
      Checks whether the user has animals on farm.
      Returns:
      True if user owns animals, false otherwise

    • checkUserHasCrops

      public boolean checkUserHasCrops()
      Checks whether the user has crops on farm.
      Returns:
      True if user owns crops, false otherwise

    • checkIfHarvestableCrops

      public boolean checkIfHarvestableCrops()
      Checks whether any crops are harvestable by looping over all crops on farm and calling isHarvestable on them.
      Returns:
      True if any crop harvestable, false otherwise

    • checkIfFarmTendable

      public boolean checkIfFarmTendable()
      Checks if farm is tendable by checking value of gameStates HasTendedFarm.
      Returns:
      True if farm tendable, false otherwise

    • actionUsed

      public void actionUsed()
      Decreases the actions left today by 1. Calls gameStates change actions left with value -1

    • playWithAnimals

      public void playWithAnimals()
      Loops over all animals on farm and calls playWithAnimal on them Then calls action used.

    • getUseableItemsOfType

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getUseableItemsOfType​(java.lang.String[] itemTypes)
      Returns all items of given type by calling gameStates getItemsOfType With itemTypes.
      Parameters:
      itemTypes - the type of items to get
      Returns:
      item ArrayList of all items of given types

    • getCrops

      public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getCrops()
      Returns ArrayList of all crops on farm.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of crops on farm

    • feedAnimals

      public void feedAnimals​(java.lang.String itemToFeed)
      Feeds all animals a type of food. Gets the first item from a list of all items of the type itemToFeed Loops over all items calling feed animal on them with parameters of itemToFeed Then calls action used and calls gameState removeItem with item object to remove
      Parameters:
      itemToFeed - the itemType to feed the animals

    • useFarmerItem

      public void useFarmerItem​(java.lang.String itemToUse)
      Uses item of type itemToUse. Gets the first item from a list of all items of the type itemToUse Increases Farmers daily actions by amount by the items permenant action boost Increases current action remaining by the items temporary action boost
      Parameters:
      itemToUse - the itemType to use

    • harvestCrops

      public void harvestCrops()
      Harvest all harvetsable crops. Creates an arraylist of all crops ready for harvest Then loops over the arraylist calling gameStates addMoney with crops sale price and removeCrop with the crop object Then calls actionUsed

    • tendFarmLand

      public void tendFarmLand()
      Tends the farmland. Increase max crops by one, decreases animal health and happiness multipliers sets had tended farm to true. Calls action used.

    • tendCrop

      public void tendCrop​(int cropArrayPostition)
      Tends to crop. Uses input parameter cropArrayPostition to find correct crop from crops list Gets Type of item toTendWith from gameState Gets first item from list of items of that type Calls tendCrop using items parameters Removes item from farm if item is not water
      Parameters:
      cropArrayPostition - The position in the crop array of the item to tend

    • getScore

      public java.lang.String getScore()
      Calculates users score. Returns score as custom string including base score and multipliers
      Returns:
      A custom score string displaying the users score

    • getUserThanks

      public java.lang.String getUserThanks()
      Returns a Thank you message based on gameState.
      Returns:
      Thank-you Message

    • deleteSaveFile

      public void deleteSaveFile()
      Deletes save file .

    • loadFromSaveFile

      public GameState loadFromSaveFile()
      Creates new TempGameState based on input parsed from save-file.
      Returns:
      TempGameState

    • checkSaveFileExists

      public boolean checkSaveFileExists()
      Returns whether or not a save-file Exists.
      Returns:
      True is save-file exists, otherwise false

    • createSaveFile

      public void createSaveFile()
      Creates save file based on current gameState. Save-file is a textual representation of all important gameState information
